alert.note: Alert for Lyon (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 28 at 2:41PM PDT until further notice by NWS Reno
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR A DAM FLOODGATE RELEASE NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by an upstream dam release and snowmelt continues. * WHERE...A portion of western Nevada, including the following county, Lyon. * WHEN...Until 300 PM PDT Friday May 05. * IMPACTS...Flooding is expected to impact East Walker Road and other low lying areas. River flows have increased and are expected to remain elevated. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 240 PM PDT, Flooding will result in the advisory area from an upstream dam floodgate release. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of Southern Lyon County, including East Walker Road. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
